name: Fleeting Colors
description:
Fleeting Colors is the final project of my game design course. this game was made in 5 weeks with 3 friends and limited help from artists and programmers. 

We tried to make a game combining luck and tactic by using a card system to define the movement of the player on an isometric grid. The game itself was more like an experimentation to study the interaction between the 2 ideas. 


A project done by:

Gabriel Martin (Me) - UI and Design
